verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G2822>called<s%> to be an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4988>Sosthenes<s%> our <S%G80>brother<s%>,

Unto the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth<s%>, to them that are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2822>called<s%> to be <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> call <S%G1941>upon<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G846>theirs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>ours<s%>:

<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>on<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4012>behalf<s%>, <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

<S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> every <S%G3956>thing<s%> ye are <S%G4148>enriched<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3056>utterance<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>;
Even <S%G2531>as<s%> the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was <S%G950>confirmed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>:

So <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> come <S%G5302>behind<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3361%G3367>no<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%>; waiting <S%G553>for<s%> the <S%G602>coming<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G950>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G950>confirm<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>, that ye may be <S%G410>blameless<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye were <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3004>ye<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> the same <S%G846>thing<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that there <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4978>divisions<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> that ye <S%G5600>be<s%> perfectly joined <S%G2675>together<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1106>judgment<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> it hath been <S%G1213>declared<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G5259>by<s%> them which are of the <S%G3588>house<s%> of <S%G5514>Chloe<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2054>contentions<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> every <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G1473%G3303>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> of <S%G625>Apollos<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> of <S%G2786>Cephas<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G3307>Is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3307%G3361>divided<s%>? <S%G4717>was<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>? <S%G2228>or<s%> were ye <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul<s%>?
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G2921>Crispus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1050>Gaius<s%>;
<S%G3363>Lest<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> should <S%G2036>say<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I had <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> mine <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> I <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3624>household<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas<s%>: <S%G3063>besides<s%>, I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> whether I <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G243>other<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G907>baptize<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%>: <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G3056>words<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should be made of none <S%G2758>effect<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3056>preaching<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> to <S%G3303>them<s%> that <S%G622>perish<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> which are <S%G4982>saved<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, I will <S%G622>destroy<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of the <S%G4680>wise<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> will bring to <S%G114>nothing<s%> the <S%G4907>understanding<s%> of the <S%G4908>prudent<s%>.

<S%G4226>Where<s%> is the <S%G4680>wise<s%>? <S%G4226>where<s%> is the <S%G1122>scribe<s%>? <S%G4226>where<s%> is the <S%G4804>disputer<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>? <S%G3471>hath<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> made <S%G3471>foolish<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1894>after<s%> that <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, it <S%G2106>pleased<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> of <S%G2782>preaching<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe<s%>.
<S%G2532%G1894>For<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G154>require<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> after <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%>, unto the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> a <S%G3303%G4625>stumblingblock<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> unto the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness<s%>;

<S%G1161>But<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G2822>called<s%>, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks<s%>, <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G3754>Because<s%> the <S%G3474>foolishness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> wiser <S%G4680>than<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G772>weakness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> stronger <S%G2478>than<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> ye <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> wise <S%G4680>men<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1415>mighty<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2104>noble<s%>, are called:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the foolish <S%G3474>things<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2617>confound<s%> the <S%G4680>wise<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the weak <S%G772>things<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2617>confound<s%> the things which are <S%G2478>mighty<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> base <S%G36>things<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> things which are <S%G1848>despised<s%>, <S%G1586>hath<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1586>chosen<s%>, yea, <S%G2532>and<s%> things <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G2443>to<s%> bring to <S%G2673>nought<s%> things that <S%G5607>are<s%>:
<S%G3704>That<s%> <S%G3361%G3956>no<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> should <S%G2744>glory<s%> in his <S%G1799%G846>presence<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%> unto <S%G2254%G5037>us<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>, and <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G629>redemption<s%>:
<S%G2443>That<s%>, according <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, He that <S%G2744>glorieth<s%>, let him <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
